content.query:
-- using DELTA
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA',
        Data_Source = 'nyc_taxi_data'        
    ) AS [result]
-- to view default datatypes
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''raw/trip_data_green_delta'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA'',
        Data_Source = ''nyc_taxi_data''        
    ) AS [result]
'
--set custom datatypes
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''raw/trip_data_green_delta'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA'',
        Data_Source = ''nyc_taxi_data''        
    ) 
with(
       VendorID  int,
       lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID int,
       PULocationID int,
       DOLocationID int,
       passenger_count int,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
       year varchar(4),
       month varchar(2)
    )AS [result]
'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA',
        Data_Source = 'nyc_taxi_data'        
    ) 
with(
        VendorID  int,
       lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
       lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
       store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
       RatecodeID int,
       PULocationID int,
       DOLocationID int,
       passenger_count int,
       trip_distance FLOAT,
       fare_amount FLOAT,
       extra FLOAT,
       mta_tax FLOAT,
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       tolls_amount FLOAT,
       ehail_fee INT,
       improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
       total_amount FLOAT,
       payment_type INT,
       trip_type INT,
       congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
       year varchar(4),
       month varchar(2)
    )AS [result]
--Select only requried columns to reduce cost 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA',
        Data_Source = 'nyc_taxi_data'        
    ) 
with(
       tip_amount FLOAT,
       trip_type INT,
       year varchar(4),
       month varchar(2)
    )AS [result]

-- using where clause
SELECT
    count(DISTINCT payment_type)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA',
        Data_Source = 'nyc_taxi_data'        
    ) AS [result]
WHERE YEAR = 2020 and month = 01
